name: Yoga Mat
description: A durable, non-slip blue yoga mat perfect for floor exercises, stretching, and yoga. Provides comfort and support during workouts.

name: Water Bottle
description: A 1-liter BPA-free water bottle with a secure flip-top lid, ideal for keeping hydrated during workouts.

name: Wrist Straps
description: Supportive wrist straps designed to improve grip and stability when lifting heavy weights.

name: Resistance Bands
description: Set of 5 resistance bands with varying resistance levels for strength training and flexibility exercises.

name: Foam Roller
description: High-density foam roller for muscle recovery, improving flexibility, and relieving muscle tightness after workouts.

name: Weightlifting Gloves
description: Breathable weightlifting gloves to prevent blisters and improve grip during intense workouts.
